faqHero.headline2: Everything you need to know about Havenova
faqHero.subtitle: Here you’ll find answers to the most common questions about our services, bookings, and payment options. If your question isn’t listed, our support team is always ready to help.

items.question: What is Havenova and how does the platform work?
items.answer: Havenova is a digital platform for home and building services in Berlin. Customers can request services such as cleaning, repairs, or furniture assembly online, compare offers, and book appointments directly.

items.question: Do I need to create an account to book a service?
items.answer: No, you can book services without creating an account. However, having an account gives you benefits such as saved addresses, access to discount promotions, and an overview of your previous bookings.

items.question: How are your services different from other providers?
items.answer: We focus on transparency, flexibility, and reliable customer service. Our services are fully customizable, and we work with qualified professionals who are insured and carefully vetted.

items.question: How can I contact customer support?
items.answer: Our support team is available Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 18:00 by email or phone. Members also benefit from priority support with shorter response times.

items.question: What is the typical booking process?
items.answer: You choose the service you need on our website, provide the details, and submit your request. Our team reviews the information and confirms the appointment or prepares a custom offer for you.

items.question: Can I book services at short notice?
items.answer: Yes, many services can be provided within 24–48 hours. For urgent cases, we always do our best to find the fastest possible solution.

items.question: Can I cancel or change my booking?
items.answer: Yes, changes and cancellations are free up to 24 hours before the appointment. For later cancellations, a cancellation fee may apply.

items.question: Will I receive a booking confirmation?
items.answer: Yes, after every request and confirmed appointment you will receive an email with all relevant details, and you can also view it in your customer dashboard.

items.question: How are prices calculated?
items.answer: Our prices depend on the type, duration, and scope of the service. For standard services, we offer transparent flat rates, while individual jobs require a tailored offer.

items.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept major payment methods including credit card, PayPal, and SEPA direct debit. For regular customers, payment by invoice is also possible.

items.question: Are there any hidden costs?
items.answer: No, all costs are shown transparently before booking. If additional work is needed during the job, we will always discuss it with you first.

items.question: Do I receive an invoice?
items.answer: Yes, after every completed service you will automatically receive a digital invoice by email, which is also available for download in your customer dashboard.

items.question: Are your employees insured?
items.answer: Yes, all of our employees and partners are fully insured. Any damage that may occur during a service is covered by our liability insurance.

items.question: How do you ensure service quality?
items.answer: We carefully select our staff, provide them with regular training, and collect customer feedback to continuously improve our services.

items.question: Do you work with external specialists?
items.answer: Yes, for specialized tasks such as electrical work, plumbing, or painting, we cooperate with certified professionals to ensure the highest quality and safety standards.

items.question: What happens if I am not satisfied with the service?
items.answer: Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you are unhappy with a service, please contact us immediately. We will review the case and find a solution together, whether that means rework or a refund.

contactSection.description: Send us your question and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

summary.heading: Our overall rating
summary.description: At the moment, we are displaying the reviews collected via MyHammer. Step by step, we are moving all new reviews to Google to ensure even greater transparency and trust.

items.question: Wo kann ich eine Bewertung abgeben?
items.answer: Neue Bewertungen können direkt über unser Google Business Profil abgegeben werden. Folgen Sie einfach dem Link 'Bewertung auf Google schreiben'.

items.question: Was passiert mit den älteren Bewertungen von MyHammer?
items.answer: Wir zeigen die bisherigen Bewertungen von MyHammer weiterhin hier auf unserer Seite an. Künftig werden alle neuen Bewertungen ausschließlich über Google gesammelt.

items.question: Kann ich meine Bewertung nachträglich ändern oder löschen?
items.answer: Ja. Bewertungen auf Google können jederzeit über Ihr eigenes Google-Konto bearbeitet oder gelöscht werden.

items.question: Wie stellen Sie die Echtheit der Bewertungen sicher?
items.answer: Durch die Nutzung von Google Business können nur Nutzer mit einem aktiven Google-Konto Bewertungen abgeben. Dadurch wird sichergestellt, dass es sich um echte Stimmen handelt.

items.question: Werden auch negative Bewertungen veröffentlicht?
items.answer: Ja. Wir glauben an Transparenz und veröffentlichen alle Bewertungen – ob positiv oder negativ.

items.answer: You can request any of our services directly through the form on our website. Simply provide all relevant details – our team will contact you with a quote or appointment suggestion.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: Your privacy matters. We process your data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Here’s a summary of who is responsible, why and how we process your data, which third parties are involved, and what rights you have.
bullets: Data Processor: Maped Solutions UG (Art. 28 GDPR).
Main legal bases: contract (Art. 6(1)(b)), legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c)), legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f)), and consent (Art. 6(1)(a)).

security.title: Security Measures (Art. 32 GDPR)
security.body: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data: encrypted passwords (bcrypt), httpOnly/secure cookies, role-based access control, HTTPS, WAF/CDN (Cloudflare), anomaly monitoring, and EU-preferred storage whenever possible. Infrastructure providers apply encryption in transit (TLS) and at rest.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Access (Art. 15), Rectification (Art. 16), Erasure (Art. 17), Restriction (Art. 18).
Portability (Art. 20), Objection (Art. 21).
Withdraw consent at any time (Art. 7(3)).
userRights.howTo: To exercise your rights, contact us at contact@havenova.de or via our contact page.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.body: We retain data only as long as needed to fulfill the intended purposes and comply with legal obligations. For example, invoices and accounting records are kept for 10 years unless otherwise required.

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.body: If data is transferred outside the EEA, appropriate safeguards (such as Standard Contractual Clauses) are in place. Whenever possible, we configure services to use EU-based data centers. Current EU preference status: Active.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to ensure the operation of this platform and to continuously improve your user experience. Some cookies are technically necessary, others require your explicit consent.
bullets: Technically necessary cookies for core functions.
Analytics cookies for anonymous usage analysis.
No marketing or tracking cookies used.
You can change your preferences at any time.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.body: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow your browser to be recognized and can store certain information such as login status or language preferences for future visits.

types.title: What types of cookies do we use?

items.name: Essential cookies
items.description: These cookies ensure the platform works correctly – e.g. for login, navigation, and security. They cannot be disabled.

items.name: Analytics cookies
items.description: These cookies help us understand how users interact with the platform – e.g. which pages are visited or which features are used. The data is anonymized and used only for internal improvements.

thirdParties.title: Third-party services
thirdParties.body: We use external services for technical analysis and payment processing. These services are configured to comply with data protection laws. The data is collected anonymously and not used for advertising purposes.

body.name: Google Analytics
body.purpose: Anonymous analysis of user behavior (page views, interactions). Used to optimize the platform.

body.name: Stripe
body.purpose: Secure payment processing. No user interaction is analyzed.

body.name: PayPal
body.purpose: Handles payments for users with PayPal accounts. No profiling is performed by Maped Solutions.

localStorage.title: Use of localStorage
localStorage.body: In addition to cookies, we use the browser's localStorage to store preferences like language, theme, or guest avatar. This data stays on your device and is not shared with any third party.

management.title: Managing cookies
management.intro: You can change your cookie preferences at any time through the banner or via your browser settings.
methods: Accept or reject cookies in the initial banner.
Use browser settings to block or delete cookies.
Access the cookie settings via the footer at any time.

legalBasis.title: Legal basis
legalBasis.body: Non-essential cookies (like analytics) are only set with your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR). Essential cookies are based on our legitimate interest in ensuring secure and functional operation of the platform (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR).

Do not interfere with the technical operation of the platform.
Keep your login credentials confidential.
